archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Control Information Pack creation, handover and agreement
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation:
Information and communications pack is created for the control area. This is based on standard template which helps stakeholders to understand the expectations and how to meet them. Information pack contains also reference data from ISF SOGP which is 1:1 copied out from the Area/topic level data.
Stakeholder is also agreeing that she/he will work on the analysis and it is then written to control responsibility data using form
